channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jon's Site

item.title: Concurrency and Parallelism
item.description: Intro Parallelism and concurrency are topics that make a lot of programmers confused, and some programmers can’t figure out the difference between them, personally, this topic is not beginner friendly, but it can be nice if you could understand it deeply, back then when I code some project I don’t consider how the process is processed behind the scene, I don’t know how to optimize some process to be more fast and efficient.
